title: how do i get my smurf acc back
body: i had made a smurf acc a long time ago forgot the email i used and the pass word so how do i get it back

replies.body: Hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help you out once you verify that you were the original creator of the account.
